Title: 2006 Jeep LJ LJR TJ Unlimited Rubicon
MapAndAttrs: 2006 jeep wrangler unlimited condition: good cylinders: 6 cylinders drive: 4wd fuel: gas odometer: 38,600 paint color: green title status: clean transmission: automatic type: offroad
PostingBody: 2006 Jeep TJ Unlimited Rubicon LJ LJR Color: Jeep Green Miles: 38,600 Job change forces reluctant sale of this amazing and ultra rare LJ Rubicon. Includes onboard air, WARN bumpers and XD9000i winch, full Rubicon Express long arm kit with Rock Jock springs, and NIB Fox shocks! Frame and body/tub have ZERO rust. This rig has been a dedicated trail monster it's entire life by one previous owner in Durango Colorado... Body has tree stripes and there's some missing paint on the hardtop as shown. There are a few small dings, etc., but if you wanted to do paint correction it should clean up nicely. This is no poser mall crawler! It's an automatic, with 4:88 gears, running Jeep OEM 35‚Äù KO2 tires and 392 XR beadlock capable wheels that are in as new condition. Way too much to list, but has Rock Hard 4x4 bolt-in sport cage, hard and soft tops, hard top lift, NIB tube doors, ALL removed Rubicon bits (MOAB wheels, sliders, fenders), rare Insta-trunk, JW Speaker LED headlights, camo seat covers over perfect seats and beautiful carpet / interior, Bushwacker fenders, Curry Currectlync steering, ORO SwayLOC, and much more. Includes many spare parts, and a few summer projects like a ready to install upgraded factory rear view mirror with compass, temp, and courtesy lights. Was planning to finish all the projects and sorting by Spring to go wheeling but unfortunately I had to change jobs so I'm back to needing a daily driver. Please no tire kickers/time wasters, or low ball offers. Have your funds in order and ask permission first. :-) If you're not sure what you're looking at this Jeep is likely not for you. If the ad is up --- "yes" it's still available so no need to ask. Seriously for sale at $35k OBO. Thanks for looking!

PostingBody: I bought the car new and have garage kept it most its life, both at home and at work. I recently had a complete vehicle inspection performed to make sure she was ready for her next owner. My mechanic said it was in impressive condition and noted two maintenance items which I had done. The safety Inspection is good until Feb 2025. The engine runs great, maintenance records are available and the tires are relatively new. Great tread on All Season run flat tires. I just had new breaks and rotors installed along with the serpentine belt. (per the mechanics recommendation) I realize there may be some priced a little lower but believe this is the lowest priced like it with these features and miles. In addition to this being a 328 xi (or also known as the 328 i Xdrive) I also purchased a few upgrade packages listed below. Cold Weather Package: Heated Steering Wheel, Heated front & rear seats, retractable headlight washers. Lighting Package: Xenon headlights. Premium Package: Comfort Access keyless entry, moon-roof, lumbar support, Satellite radio*. Technology Package: Navigation system with touch-pad, heads-up display, BMW online, Advanced RTTI, remote services, BMW apps Enhanced B/T and smartphone. MapAndAttrs: 2016 ford escape se condition: like new cylinders: 4 cylinders fuel: gas odometer: 108,000 paint color: red title status: clean transmission: automatic type: SUV
PostingBody: Selling my 2016 Ford Escape SE with only 108k miles on it. The vehicle is in excellent shape as you can see from the photos. We have always serviced it early and its treated us very well. All the maintenance have been kept to date. The car is in excellent shape and needs nothing just a new driver. Would make an excellent family car as its great on gas and has ample space. The car just recently had 4 tires and brakes replaced. The Heat blows very hot and A/C blows ice cold. Engine feels strong and Transmission drives very smoothly. The car doesn't make a rattle or have any knocking noise. Almost all the miles are soft highway miles. any questions feel free to call or text.

PostingBody: I'm selling my 2010 Subaru legacy sedan. It's pearl white. It looks great and drives even better. Literally drives like a new car. No suspension noises. No smoking from the tailpipe. SERIOUS BUYERS ONLY.

MapAndAttrs: 1999 Ford e450 shuttle bus condition: good fuel: diesel odometer: 120,000 title status: clean transmission: automatic type: truck
PostingBody: And here is 1999 Ford E-450 short bus with only 120K with a 7,3 L diesel, known as Fords best and most reliable engine. The transmission is very smooth, has no leaks. The tires are nice, with plenty of tread and life left. The bus runs and drives without any issues. Is equipped with service tanks. One is a waste tank and the other a clean water tank. It is also equipped with a hand sink as well as a 3 compartment wash sink. There is a speaker system, sideslide service window,, and wired with 3 electric sockets to run refrigerator, freezer or other appliances. This bus was set up as a frozen and shaved ice business. However as a multipurpose vehicle, it can be easily converted to great food truck not investing much. Addionally it can easily be converted to camper or whatever you could imagine. Has 4 entry doors that provides for many options or uses. Now the not so perfect : I'm selling it as it is, therefor I haven't put addional effort to fix any of the included equipment knowing the options are unlimited for its future use. There are a few small mostly cosmetic items you may or may not want to address. The front passenger bus entery door will not latch closed, the rear emergency door is rusted on the bottom. Please look at the pictures to see these minor issues. There are a couple of other small rusty spots bubbling under the paint, but that's minor. If you chose to wrap the truck these may no need to be fixed. Otherwise it is a very solid body and solid frame. Comes with two freezers but are old and are more likely not suitable for restaurant use. The bus won't take much to be cleaned inside and out and made ready for its future use. I am sure it will be a great money maker for its next owner with not investing much. I'm asking 12K, with prices of these service trucks starting from 30K and the range goes up to 60-70-80k for almost same style food service trucks. Clean title in hand. This is a great opportunity for adventurous and hardworking person wanting to start up a small business. Call show contact info , Thank you.

You say you help people with less than perfect credit, are you a Buy Here - Pay Here lot? No. We are not a buy here - pay here lot. However, because we are the largest retailer of New and Used vehicles in the U.S. we have access to banks and credit unions that can be a tremendous benefit to extremely challenged credit. Can I really secure financing with zero down payment? Many customers actually take delivery without a checkbook or credit card. We need to buy cars from customers every day because of the huge demand in the used vehicle market. It isn't necessary for you to buy a vehicle either. We'd love to purchase your vehicle regardless of age or mileage in most cases. What if I want to trade in my vehicle but still owe more than it's worth. This is another very common situation that usually won't prevent you from trading your vehicle and taking delivery of your next New or PreOwned vehicle. Are you guys really 1price? Won't you negotiate? We've found that every single customer wants our bottom-line best price up front. Imagine going to a dealership and telling them "don't tell me your best price, instead, keep going back and forth to your manager and waste as much of my time as possible, until we finally find your best price, and then try to guilt me into buying because you spent so much time with me". If that's actually what you want, you may need help. We put our bottom line lowest price on every pre-owned vehicle and then let you decide if, and when you want to buy it. No pressure.
